[Art of Combat: PvP Crystals]
-by Dougal-

This book contains my humble opinions on the efficacy of crystals in PvP, opinions formed through battles against the gifted soldiers of the Valkyon Federation. I hope this book will be helpful for whoever takes the time to read it.

Follow the recommendations in this book and equip the best crystal for your combat style.

- DPS/Tanks -

[Weapon Crystals]
Savage: Critical attacks do an additional damage when attacking from behind
Forceful: Crits increase Power when attacking from behind
Cruel: Increases Crit Power after knocking down an opponent.
Carving: Increases the chance to crit
Swift: Increases Movement Speed while in combat


[Armor Crystals]
Relentless: Increases maximum HP
Resolute: Reduces damage when you are below 50% HP
Warding: Has a chance to apply a warding effect when knocked down


[Accessory Crystals]
Griefing: Increases PvP Attack
Indomitable: Increases PvP Defense

- Healers -

[Weapon Crystals]
Swift: Increases Movement Speed while in combat
Brilliant: Replenishes MP
Carving: Increases the chance to crit


[Armor Crystals]
Relentless: Increases maximum HP
Resolute: Reduces damage when you are below 50% HP
Warding: Has a chance to apply a warding effect when knocked down


[Accessory Crystals]
Indomitable: Increases PvP Defense

Crystals are sold by brokers in various regions and Vanguard Initiative Crystal Merchants at Highwatch. Close the book.
